text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

Every year 5
billion days of work

are missed in Latin America due
to turnover and absenteeism.

But at the same time,
there's over 100 million

underemployed Latin Americans
looking for extra work.

Apli fixes this disconnect
with technology.

We are Latin America's
first on demand jobs

platform that provides qualified
workers in less than 24 hours.

Our consumer facing
technology is

the chat bot that works on
mobile messaging platforms.

Our chat bot has a conversation
with candidates to profile them

with online tests designed
by Apli for 20 of the most
common jobs.

When companies request
help, our matching algorithm

finds the best
candidate for the role,

our chat bot offers
them the opportunity
and answers their questions.

This allows Apli to fill
a vacancy in minutes.

And each assignment is rated by
both the worker and the company

allowing our matching
algorithm to improve
through machine learning.

Businesses love
Apli because they

can access a flexible
qualified on demand workforce.

And workers love
Apli because they

make five times the minimum
wage since companies

are willing to pay
more for variable labor
when they truly need it.

Apli's mission is to
help businesses scale

by providing millions
of Latin Americans

with jobs that adapt
to their lives.

So if you're excited
about disrupting

traditional recruiting
download Apli and Facebook

Messenger and never miss
a day of work again.
Thank you.
[APPLAUSE]
